answers.answer: My first daughter was born 5 weeks early and she had no difficulty breathing. Hope all is well xx

question: I am 37 weeks and 5 days pregnant. I have type 1 diabetes. I had an amnio done 7 days ago and the baby's lungs weren't mature. I'm having another amnio done tomorrow. I'm wanting to know the chance I have that his lungs will be fully matured.
title: Chance of lung maturity at 38 weeks
